text: Iraq was first at the Olympic Games in 1948. Since 1980, Iraq has been in every game despite the [[Iraq War]]. Iraq has never been at the Winter Olympic Games. Iraq has been represented by the National Olympic Committee of Iraq since 1948. ==Medalists== Medal Name Games Sport Event Abdul Wahid Aziz 1960 Rome Weightlifting Men's Lightweight ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes == References == ==Other websites == * Iraq profile at London2012.com Category:Sport in Iraq Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Iraq at the Olympics
